author: Cleo Abram
description:
A brand new medical treatment seems to have saved this little boy’s life.

Out of the 20,000 genes in his body, one has a rare mutation, causing a life-threatening disorder.

To help, scientists took stem cells from his blood, then used a harmless virus to insert a new working gene… 

For more optimistic science and tech stories, subscribe!

#science #medicine #gene #tech #shorts
title: New Medical Treatment Saved This Little Boy’s Life
